examples.example: 合理的投资可以让我们的财富不断增长。

translate.english: Reasonable investment can make our wealth continuously increase.

examples.example: 他经过深思熟虑后进行了理性的投资，收获了不错的回报。

translate.english: He made a rational investment after careful consideration and reaped good returns.

examples.example: 积极进行合理投资，能够为未来的生活增添更多的保障。

translate.english: Actively making rational investment can add more guarantees to the future life.
